org.workplicity.entry.event
Class Recurring

java.lang.Object
  org.workplicity.entry.Entry
      org.workplicity.entry.event.Event
          org.workplicity.entry.event.Recurring
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Daily, Monthly, Once, Weekdays, Weekly, Yearly
public abstract class Recurring
extends Event

This class is subclassed by all timeed events.

See Also:
